name: Timothy_Leary
text:
Timothy Leary
Dr. Timothy Leary reviewed Dr. Lawrence Jacoby's book, The Eye of God: Sacred Psychology in the Aboriginal Mind, commenting, "Jacoby talks the talk and he definitely walks the walk."
Behind the scenes
Timothy Leary (October 22, 1920 – May 31, 1996) was an American psychologist and proponent of psychoactive drugs.
